summary: A struggling author and his wife suddenly become wealthy and move to the suburbs. Divorced neighbor and "companion" aid marital misconstrual which almost culminates in a divorce.
cast: Janet Leigh|Van Johnson|Shelley Winters|Martha Hyer|Ray Walston|Jeremy Slate|Claire Wilcox|Lee Patrick|Dick Wessel|Dave Willock|Don Anderson|Eleanor Audley|Danny Borzage|George Bruggeman|Jack Carr|Steve Carruthers|Robert Carson|Paul Cristo|Fritz Feld|Herschel Graham|Dabbs Greer|Stuart Hall|Jerry Hausner|Marianna Hill|Charles Morton|William H. O'Brien|Paul Power|Jeffrey Sayre|Joan Staley
keywords: 1960s|husband and wife relationship|connecticut|new england|northeastern united states
title: Ellas y las otras
